decision_conditions: By reason of its scale, width, insufficient set back, and insufficient set down, the proposed first floor side extension would not appear subordinate or proportionate the existing dwellinghouse, would be excessive in scale, would sit uncomfortably with the host and surrounding properties and within the street scene and would represent a cramped form of development which would be out of keeping with the character and appearance of the original property and would be detrimental to the visual amenities of the area, thereby conflicting with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

By reason of the proposed gable ended design, the roof form would not relate well to the dwellinghouse or other properties on Reynolds Road which is characterised by hipped roofs, and would therefore be out of keeping with the character and appearance of the original property and surrounding area, thereby conflicting with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Erection of part two storey/part single storey rear, first floor side extension. Hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and installation of 3nos front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion.
